description:

title: SDE - I (Frontend)
description:
**About Unloq:** 




 Unloq is revolutionizing the way Brands and Banks focus on growth. We are building a new\\-age growth platform that empowers Banks to collaborate with Brands to launch hyper\\-targeted campaigns, helping them reach the right target audience and drive higher ROI.
 



  





 We are growing and actively hiring across the roles. If you are looking to be part of the core team building the new\\-age growth platform, do reach out to us.
 



  





**What are we looking for :** 



* Building scalable and responsive web applications that work well across different devices and browsers.
* Designing and developing user interfaces using front\\-end frameworks such as React and NextJS
* Implement design and wireframes , ensuring pixel perfect layouts and UI components
* Implementing RESTful APIs for integrating front\\-end interfaces with back\\-end services.
* Collaborating with designers and other stakeholders to translate requirements into features
* Writing clean, maintainable code and following coding standards and best practices.
* Performing unit testing and integration testing to ensure the quality and stability of applications.
* Monitoring and optimizing application performance, security, and scalability.
* Knowledge of Figma is an added advantage



  





**Why Join Us:** 



* Be a part of the team that solves the most burning problem \\- Achieving Growth.
* Opportunity to join an early\\-stage team, giving you a lot of ownership and accelerated career growth
* Intense brainstorming and whiteboarding on interesting problems and innovation guaranteed.
* Work directly with founders and align with the vision of the company.
* Competitive ESOPs aligned with the company's long\\-term vision.

title: Software Developer, India
description:
**At AlgoSec, what you do matters!**
 Over 2,200 of the world‚Äôs leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on\\-premises networks.
   

  

 Join our global team, securing application connectivity, anywhere.
   

  

 We are hiring a Software Developer to join our Customer Focus R\\&D team.
   

  

**Reporting to:** 
 R\\&D Customer Focus Team Leader
   

  

**Location:** 
 Gurgaon, India
   

  

**Direct Employment**
**Responsibilities**
* Join a special and dynamic development team, solving complex issues seen in the field. Daily interaction with other development teams, technical services, and QA.
* Use profilers, debuggers, other tools and ‚Äúout of the box‚Äù thinking to improve component performance and scalability.
* Work with a wide range of technologies \\& systems such as Java, microservices, Spring, Perl, Linux, AWS infrastructure, Angular, PostgreSQL, ActiveMQ, and more.
* Become familiar with the entire AlgoSec suite and the underlying codebase while contributing to training and performing knowledge transfers within the company.


**Requirements**
* Graduated with an elite university (IIT, NIT) with excellence.
* Knowledge in software development (Java).
* At least 5 years of experience in Java software development.
* Team player, pleasant person to work with, high level of integrity.
* Fast learner, bright, independent and organized.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.


**Advantages**
* Experience in any of the following technologies: Spring Boot applications, Hibernate, JPA, concurrency, Perl, C, PHP, Ruby, Angular, AWS cloud development‚ÄØand networking.
* Knowledge in Linux/UNIX environments.
* Multitasking, "out\\-of\\-the\\-box" thinking and problem\\-solving abilities.
* Experience with full stack troubleshooting and providing support for enterprise applications.
* Experience in customer\\-facing roles, working with enterprise customers.
* Previous experience in the security space.


 AlgoSec is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO), committed to creating a friendly, diverse and inclusive company culture.

title: Software Developer (Devices), India
description:
**At AlgoSec, What you do matters!**
 Over 2,200 of the world‚Äôs leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on\\-premises networks.
   

  

 Join our global team, securing application connectivity, anywhere.
   

  

 We are hiring an experienced Software Developer to join a highly dynamic R\\&D environment, and take part in creating the new architecture of AlgoSec products and design complicated systems.
   

  

**Reporting to:** 
 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

**Location:** 
 Gurgaon, India
   

  

 Direct employment
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Devices team is responsible for the lowest layer of AlgoSec's products, focusing of integrating and interfacing various networking security products (mainly firewalls and routers) and modeling their configuration and topology into the AlgoSec unified model. This includes working with various vendors APIs , technologies, and models.
* Own processes E2E, while dealing with complicated issues and crafting innovative solutions


**Requirements**
* B.Sc. in Computer Sciences/Engineering from a known university.
* 5 years of experience in software development.
* Experience in server\\-side software development.
* Experience in Linux/UNIX environments.
* Experience in Java 8 or higher, Spring, SQL.
* Team player, pleasant person to work with, high level of integrity.
* Very bright, fast learner, independent and organized.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Good to have proven experience working with LLMs, AI tools and techniques.


**Advantages**
* Experience with Perl, Python, Ruby, Lua or similar
* Experience in networking, routing protocols, firewalls
* Experience with microservices, container deployment and management

title: Web Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Mentter Labs builds practical software for real\\-world problems. We focus on simple ideas, clean execution, and learning by doing. Our work includes web and mobile apps, automation tools, and product prototypes. We believe real skills are built by working on real products, not fake assignments.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a remote, unpaid internship for a Web Development Intern.
 



 You will work on real internal and client projects and learn how software is built and shipped in the real world.
 



  





 This role is focused on learning, exposure, and hands\\-on experience. If you are looking only for money, this role is not for you. If you are looking to grow fast, this is.
 



  





**What You Will Do** 




 Work on real web applications (frontend and basic backend)
 



 Assist in building and improving features
 



 Debug issues and learn best practices
 



 Collaborate with the team using real tools and workflows
 



 Learn how production\\-ready software is built and maintained
 



  





**What We Are Looking For** 




 Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 



 Familiarity with any framework is a plus (React, Next.js, etc.)
 



 Willingness to learn and take feedback seriously
 



 Ability to work independently in a remote setup
 



 Students or fresh graduates are welcome
 



  





**What You Will Get** 




 Real project experience
 



 Mentorship and guidance
 



 Internship certificate
 



 Letter of recommendation (for good performance)
 



 Strong portfolio\\-worthy work
 



  





 Note: This is an unpaid internship. Please apply only if you are comfortable with this.
 



  





**Duration** 



* 1 to 3 months (flexible, based on performance)

title: Intern - AI Agents Developer
description:
**üöÄ AI Marketing Automation Developer Intern**
**AI\\-First \\| High Ownership \\| Long\\-Term Opportunity**
**üìç About The Role**
 We are building an
 **AI\\-first marketing and communications engine** 
 across multiple products and brands.
   

  

 This role is for someone who wants to
 **use AI to eliminate manual work** 
 , not do more of it.
   

  

 This is
 **not a traditional marketing internship** 
 .
   

  

 It is a builder role focused on
 **automation, experimentation, and systems thinking** 
 .
   

  

**üß† How We Work**
* AI\\-first, automation\\-first mindset
* We focus on outcomes, not activity
* You will work independently on clearly defined objectives
* Minimal meetings, maximum ownership
* Trial, iterate, break, fix, and improve
* What you build is expected to be production\\-ready, not just a demo


 We use modern AI tools (including Cursor and LLMs) and expect you to
 **learn fast and apply faster** 
 .
   

  

**‚úÖ Who This Is For**
 This role is a strong fit if you:
   

  

* Think in terms of systems and leverage
* Enjoy solving open\\-ended problems
* Are comfortable with ambiguity
* Like experimenting until something works
* Want to work in a real AI\\-first environment, not just talk about AI


 Background matters less than mindset.
   

  

 Engineering, tech\\-savvy marketing, or self\\-taught AI backgrounds all work.
   

  

**‚ùå Who This Is NOT For**
* Manual or repetitive marketing work
* Copy\\-paste or template\\-only roles
* People who need detailed step\\-by\\-step instructions


**üå± Growth \\& Long\\-Term Path**
 This is a
 **long\\-term internship** 
 , not a short project.
   

  

**Interns Who**
* Consistently deliver
* Show ownership
* Fit into our AI\\-first work culture


 üëâ
 **Will be converted to full\\-time roles.**
**Hiring and conversion decisions are made jointly by the founders and the automation team lead.**
**üïí Commitment**
* 20‚Äì30 hours per week minimum
* Fully remote
* Flexible working hours (output \\> hours)


**Send**
**üí° How to Apply**
 A short note on
 **why this role excites you**
**Any Proof Of**
* AI tools you‚Äôve used
* Automation you‚Äôve attempted
* Projects you‚Äôve built (academic, personal, or professional)


 No formal resume required if your work speaks for itself.
   

  

 Skills:\\- Python, Javascript and React.js

title: Software Engineer - Backend Java
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission\\-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward ‚Äì always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
 Are you passionate about solving complex problems? Do you thrive in a fast\\-paced environment? Then there‚Äôs a good chance you will love being a part of our Software Engineering ‚Äì Development team at Kyndryl, where you will be able to see the immediate value of your work.
   

  

 As a Software Engineering \\- Developer at Kyndryl, you will be at the forefront of designing, developing, and implementing cutting\\-edge software solutions. Your work will play a critical role in our business offering, your code will deliver value to our customers faster than ever before, and your attention to detail and commitment to quality will be critical in ensuring the success of our products.
   

  

 Using design documentation and functional programming specifications, you will be responsible for implementing identified components. You will ensure that implemented components are appropriately documented, unit\\-tested, and ready for integration into the final product. You will have the opportunity to architect the solution, test the code, and deploy and build a CI/CD pipeline for it.
   

  

 As a valued member of our team, you will provide work estimates for assigned development work, and guide features, functional objectives, or technologies being built for interested parties. Your contributions will have a significant impact on our products' success, and you will be part of a team that is passionate about innovation, creativity, and excellence. Above all else, you will have the freedom to drive innovation and take ownership of your work while honing your problem\\-solving, collaboration, and automation skills. Together, we can make a difference in the world of cloud\\-based managed services.
   

  

 Your Future at Kyndryl
   

  

 The career path ahead is full of exciting opportunities to grow and advance within the job family. With dedication and hard work, you can climb the ladder to higher bands, achieving coveted positions such as Principal Engineer or Vice President of Software. These roles not only offer the chance to inspire and innovate, but also bring with them a sense of pride and accomplishment for having reached the pinnacle of your career in the software industry.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You‚Äôre good at what you do and possess the required experience to prove it. However, equally as important ‚Äì you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer\\-focused ‚Äì someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you‚Äôre open and borderless ‚Äì naturally inclusive in how you work with others.
   

  

**Required Technical And Professional Experience**
* 6\\+ years of experience working as a software engineer on complex software projects
* Excellent coding skills and solid development experience (Java, SpringBoot) with debugging and problem\\-solving skills
* AWS development experience
* Experience with AWS Lambda, AWS services, and microservices.
* Software development methodologies, with demonstrated experience developing scalable and robust software
* Experienced in relational and NoSQL databases, data mapping, XML/JSON, Rest based web services
* Knowledge of architecture design \\- Microservices architecture, containers (Docker \\& k8s), messaging queues
* Deep understanding of OOP and Design patterns


**Preferred Technical And Professional Experience**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience
* Certification in one or more of the hyperscalers (Azure, AWS, and Google GCP) \\- otherwise, you can obtain certifications with Kyndryl
* Experience with DevOps tools and modern engineering practices


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it‚Äôs how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we‚Äôre not doing it single\\-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you ‚Äì and everyone next to you ‚Äì the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That‚Äôs the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state\\-of\\-the\\-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well\\-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter ‚Äì wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company\\-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non\\-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‚ÄòHow Did You Hear About Us‚Äô during the application process, select ‚ÄòEmployee Referral‚Äô and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: Web Developer Intern
description:
**Web Developer Intern (Unpaid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web interfaces
* Integrate APIs and manage efficient client‚Äìserver communication
* Optimize websites for performance, speed, and SEO best practices
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure a smooth user experience



**Requirements** 



* Currently pursuing or completed a Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with basic knowledge of frontend frameworks
* Familiarity with backend technologies such as Node.js, Python (Flask/Django), or PHP
* Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB and Git version control
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world web projects with live deployment
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers
* Opportunity to build a strong, professional web development portfolio
* Networking and placement assistance post\\-internship
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

title: Full Stack Automation Developer, India
description:
**At AlgoSec, What you do matters!**
 Over 2,200 of the world‚Äôs leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on\\-premises networks.
   

  

 Join our global team, securing application connectivity, anywhere.
   

  

 We are hiring a QA Automation Developer to join our global team working in an agile environment.
   

  

**Reporting to:** 
 QA team Leader
   

  

**Location:** 
 Gurgaon, India
   

  

**Direct employment**
**Responsibilities**
* Perform end\\-to\\-end (E2E) testing, including test design, automation, and execution.
* Write and maintain automated tests across multiple environments.
* Contribute to expanding automation coverage for regression and new features.
* Collaborate with development, DevOps, and QA teams to ensure seamless test integration within CI/CD pipelines.


**Requirements**
* BE/BTech/BSc in Computer Science/Engineering with GPA 8\\.5 and above.
* Minimum 2 year of experience in developing automated tests using object\\-oriented programming (Java) and building complex automation with Selenium.
* Hands\\-on experience in with TestNG.
* Experience with API / REST automation ‚Äì good to have.
* Solid background in manual QA testing (ability to define and execute manual tests before automation).
* Experience working in Linux/UNIX environments.
* Strong multitasking and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to context switch and think ‚Äúout of the box.‚Äù
* Knowledge of automation framework architecture, design, and development.
* Good understanding of software build tools, CI/CD integrations, deployment pipelines, and code quality\\-checking tools.
* Proficiency in log scanning for error detection and root cause analysis.
* Team player, proactive, organized, thorough, and dependable.
* Fast learner, independent, with excellent communication skills in English (written and verbal).


**Advantages**
* Experience in QA of network security software products.
* Exposure to cloud platforms: primarily AWS, with experience in Azure, GCP, or other cloud environments considered a strong advantage.
* Experience in testing SaaS applications.


 AlgoSec is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO), committed to creating a friendly, diverse and inclusive company culture.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:

**Location: India (Remote) \\| Full\\-time** 




  





 We‚Äôre looking for a
 **hands\\-on Data Scientist** 
 who‚Äôs deeply experienced with
 **transformer architectures** 
 ,
 **multimodal AI** 
 , and
 **model optimization** 
 . Someone who loves rapid experimentation, thrives in a startup\\-style environment, and can take complete ownership from prototype ‚Üí production.

* Build and fine\\-tune advanced transformer\\-based models (LLMs, Whisper, diffusion, LoRA, RLHF/SFT).

 **audio, video, text** 
 ‚Äî with depth in at least one.
* Push the boundaries in
 **lip\\-sync accuracy** 
 ,
 **character/scene consistency** 
 ,
 **audio realism** 
 , and
 **video quality** 
 .
* Design automated evaluation frameworks for image, audio, and video quality scoring.
* Experiment with

 , background score blending, and text\\-to\\-video alignment.
* Stay on top of emerging architectures, tools, and scaling strategies.

 **Python** 
 ,
 **PyTorch/TensorFlow** 
 .
* Deep expertise in

 (audio/video/text) with real end\\-to\\-end project work.

* Ability to design automated evaluation metrics for generative output.
* High adaptability and willingness to run rapid experiments.



  





**üéÅ What You Get** 



* **Best\\-in\\-class salary** 
 ‚Äî we hire the best, and pay accordingly.

 .
* Learn directly from leaders who have built global\\-scale tech products.
* Exposure to cutting\\-edge initiatives across sports, media, entertainment.

 **your impact is visible and immediate** 
 .

title: Senior Software Engineer (Web)
description:
**Job Summary:** 
 As a Senior Software Engineer, you‚Äôll build a world\\-class platform for our customers by solving complex technical problems and building systems that run at scale. You will play a critical role in developing code and solving problems independently while shaping our next\\-gen solutions that drive our company's mission forward. We seek candidates with a passion for crafting elegant code and building innovative software solutions.
 



  





**About the team:** 
 Join our Player team to build and optimize world\\-class video playback experiences for millions of users on Desktop browsers, Smart TVs (like webOS, Tizen, and VIDAA), Mobile browsers etc. If you‚Äôre passionate about streaming technology and delivering smooth, high\\-quality playback, join us!
 



  





**Key responsibilities:** 



* **Architecture \\& Design:** 
 Lead the design of complex front\\-end systems using modern frameworks (React.js, Next.js, and Typescript preferred) and state management libraries.
* **Performance Engineering:** 
 Optimize web applications for maximum speed, scalability, and Core Web Vitals. Optimize startup time, rebuffering, memory usage, and rendering performance,PFR, startup time, errors, and engagement.
* **Cross Browser:** 
 Ensure a seamless experience across desktop browsers, mobile web, and Smart TV web platforms (Tizen, webOS).
* **Mentorship:** 
 Conduct rigorous code reviews and mentor junior/mid\\-level engineers on best practices and design patterns.
* **Collaboration:** 
 Partner with Product Managers and UX Designers to translate wireframes into high\\-quality, reusable components.
* **Streaming:** 
 Integrate player UI with video playback engines (HTML5, MSE, EME).
* **Analytics \\& QoS:** 
 Design and integrate analytics and observability frameworks to track key metrics such as startup time, buffering ratio, rebuffer frequency, bitrate switches/drops, playback failures, and user engagement, enabling data\\-driven performance optimization and rollout decisions.
* **Triaging Production issues:** 
 Ability to debug and resolve production issues under pressure, demonstrating a strong ownership mindset with a bias for performance and reliability, and delivering timely fixes that minimize customer impact.
* **Security Compliance:** 
 Strong understanding of
 **web security best practices,** 
 including
 **XSS prevention, CSP, CORS** 
 , secure media playback, and DRM\\-related attack vectors.



  





**Skills and attributes for success:** 



* 2\\-7 years of professional experience in modern web development.
* Expert\\-level knowledge of
 **TypeScript** 
 ,
 **React/Next.js** 
 , and
 **CSS\\-in\\-JS** 
 (styled\\-components/Tailwind).
* Deep hands\\-on experience with
 **HTML5 video players and SDKs** 
 such as
 **Shaka Player, HLS.js, Video.js, and Dash.js** 
 , including customization of UI, buffering logic, error handling, and ABR behavior.
* **Protocols:** 
 Expert knowledge of
 **HLS and MPEG\\-DASH** 
 , including manifest structure, segmenting, DRM, and adaptive bitrate.
* Hands\\-on experience with modern build systems (Webpack, Vite, Rollup), CI/CD pipelines, and automated testing (Jest, React Testing Library, Playwright), ensuring high\\-quality A/B experiments and production\\-ready releases.



  





**Preferred education and experience:** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or a related field.
* 2\\-7 years of Web development experience.



  





**About Us** 




 Perched firmly at the nucleus of spellbinding content and innovative technology, JioStar is a leading global media \\& entertainment company that is reimagining the way audiences consume entertainment and sports. Its television network and streaming service together reach more than 750 million viewers every week, igniting the dreams and aspirations of hundreds of million people across geographies.
 



  





*JioStar is an equal opportunity employer. The company values diversity and its mission is to create a workplace where everyone can bring their authentic selves to work. The company ensures that the work environment is free from any discrimination against persons with disabilities, gender, gender identity and any other characteristics or status that is legally protected.*

title: Junior Flutter Developer
description:
**About Wastel**
 Wastel is a climate\\-tech startup building a waste\\-to\\-fuel and carbon intelligence platform that connects farmers, waste processors, industries, and regulators through a single digital ecosystem.
   

 We are incubated by IIT (BHU) Varanasi and work on real, on\\-ground sustainability problems‚Äîwaste management, clean energy, and carbon reduction‚Äîusing mobile technology as the backbone.
   

 This is not a demo app or a side project.
   

 Your code will power real users, real transactions, and real climate impact.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are looking for a committed Flutter developer to work on the Wastel mobile application alongside the founder, product owner, and designer.
   

  

**This role is ideal for:**
* Early\\-career Flutter developers
* Strong self\\-learners or recent graduates
* Developers who want end\\-to\\-end app experience
* Those who want to grow with a startup from an early stage
* You will work on actual production features, not just assignments.


**Key Responsibilities**
 1\\. Flutter App Development
   

* Develop and maintain mobile app features using Flutter
* Convert Figma designs into clean, responsive UI
* Implement navigation, state handling, and reusable widgets
* Ensure smooth performance and bug\\-free experience


 2\\. Backend \\& Integrations (Guided)
   

* Integrate with Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Storage)
* Handle basic API integrations
* Work with real\\-time data and app state
* (You will be guided‚Äîthis is a learning\\-focused role.)


 3\\. Product Collaboration
   

* Work closely with the designer and product owner
* Understand feature requirements, not just code blindly
* Suggest improvements and optimizations where possible


**Skills \\& Requirements
   

 Must\\-have**
* Basic to intermediate knowledge of Flutter \\& Dart
* Understanding of mobile app fundamentals
* Ability to read, debug, and improve existing code
* Willingness to learn and take responsibility


**Good to have (Not Mandatory)**
* Firebase experience
* State management basics (Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, etc.)
* Prior app published on Play Store (even personal project)


**Compensation \\& Commitment**
* ‚Çπ15,000 per month (fixed)
* Initial commitment: 3 months
* Flexible working hours (remote\\-friendly)
* Clear tasks and achievable timelines
* This role prioritizes learning, ownership, and growth over short\\-term salary.


**What You Will Gain (This Matters)**
**Hands\\-on experience building a production\\-grade app
   

 Exposure to:**
* Full app lifecycle (design ‚Üí development ‚Üí deployment)
* Startup architecture and decision\\-making
* IIT incubation ecosystem and evaluations
* Strong real\\-world projects for your resume
* Direct mentorship and feedback


**Opportunity for:**
* Role expansion
* Increased responsibility
* Long\\-term association as Wastel scales
* If you perform well, this will not remain a junior role.


**Who Should Apply**
* Developers serious about becoming strong Flutter engineers
* People who want ownership, not just tasks
* Candidates comfortable working in an early\\-stage startup
* Those who care about building something meaningful


**How to Apply**
 Please share:
   

* Your Flutter experience or projects (GitHub / Drive / APK)
* CV

title: EY - GDS Consulting - AIA - Gen AI - Senior
description:
At EY, we‚Äôre all in to shape your future with confidence.
   

  

 We‚Äôll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.
   

  

 Join EY and help to build a better working world.
   

  

**Senior AI \\& Automation Developer**
**About The Role**
 We are seeking an experienced AI \\& Automation Developer to lead advanced projects leveraging technologies like Large Language Models (LLMs), IDP, NLP, Azure Functions, Python, Graph and Vector Databases. You will play a key role in designing and delivering enterprise\\-grade AI solutions, mentoring junior team members, and ensuring technical excellence.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Lead development and implementation of AI \\& Automation solutions aligned with business objectives
* Architect and deploy Proof of Concepts (POCs) and Points of View (POVs) across industry verticals
* Ensure robust integration of AI solutions into enterprise systems and cloud environments (Azure, AWS, GCP)
* Collaborate with stakeholders to define technical requirements and solution roadmaps
* Mentor junior developers and promote best practices in AI development and deployment
* Stay ahead of emerging technologies and drive innovation within projects


**Requirements**
* 5‚Äì8 years of experience in AI/ML and automation development
* Strong expertise in Python and frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Langchain, MLflow)
* Hands\\-on experience with LLMs (GPT\\-3/4, BERT, T5\\) and fine\\-tuning techniques
* Deep understanding of prompt engineering, RAG architecture, and Knowledge Graphs
* Experience deploying AI models on cloud platforms and integrating with enterprise applications
* Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills


**What We Look For**
* A team of people with commercial acumen, technical experience and enthusiasm to learn new things in this fast\\-moving environment
* An opportunity to be a part of market\\-leading, multi\\-disciplinary team of 1400\\+ professionals, in the only integrated global transaction business worldwide
* Opportunities to work with EY Advisory practices globally with leading businesses across a range of industries


**What Working At EY Offers**
* Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around
* Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career
* The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that‚Äôs right for you


**EY \\| Building a better working world**
 EY is building a better working world by creating new value for clients, people, society and the planet, while building trust in capital markets.
   

  

 Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.
   

  

 EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi\\-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.

title: SDE INTERN (Remote)
description:
**Company Description** 








 Cehpoint is a forward\\-thinking IT and cybersecurity company specializing in secure, scalable, and intelligent technology solutions. Founded by ethical hackers and experienced IT professionals, the company provides services such as software development, cloud infrastructure, IT consulting, and advanced cybersecurity solutions like penetration testing and vulnerability assessments. Cehpoint is driven by a mission to empower businesses, from startups to enterprises, with cutting\\-edge technology and robust security measures. With an emphasis on innovation and reliability, Cehpoint ensures that its clients operate confidently and securely in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
 



  





**Role Description** 








 This is a remote internship as a Software Development Engineer (SDE) Intern. The role involves learning and contributing to various software development projects. Responsibilities include writing efficient code, assisting in back\\-end development, and gaining hands\\-on experience with object\\-oriented programming and other computer science principles. Interns will collaborate with the team to develop innovative IT solutions and enhance their technical expertise.
 



  





**Qualifications** 







* Strong foundation in Computer Science concepts and principles
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development tasks
* Experience or knowledge in Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)
* Ability to collaborate effectively in a remote working environment
* Curiosity to learn new technologies and coding languages
* Pursuing or completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
